description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores concepts like the global village, ecosystem architecture, and internet fragmentation. yeehaa's courses cover topics such as ecosystem grooming, keeping the web weird, practicing innovation, and valuing differences. His approach combines strategic thinking with practical action, emphasizing creativity, diversity, and open knowledge exchange.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur. Transforms education and tech. Advocates inclusive internet. Explores global village, ecosystem design. Unites people, translates visions. Courses on innovation, diversity, web weirdness.
